casebody.data:
2016-202 (La. 5/2/16)

STATE EX REL. Damon PATTERSON v. STATE of Louisiana NO. 2016-KH-202 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 2, 2016

Applying for Reconsideration of this Court’s action dated March 14, 2016, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court, Divisions G, B, Nos. 381-113, 509-482; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Nos. 2015-K-1250, 2015-K-1251

|, Reconsideration denied.
